plot: When Katherine tells her roommates, Tina and Meryl, she is unexpectedly moving out, they are forced to find a new roommate in a short amount of time. However, their lack of friends poses a problem only Craigslist can fix.
plot_en: When Katherine tells her roommates, Tina and Meryl, she is unexpectedly moving out, they are forced to find a new roommate in a short amount of time. However, their lack of friends poses a problem only Craigslist can fix.
plot_es: When Katherine tells her roommates, Tina and Meryl, she is unexpectedly moving out, they are forced to find a new roommate in a short amount of time. However, their lack of friends poses a problem only Craigslist can fix.
title: My Craigslist Roommate
